id.description: unique project id used to store local settings

icon.description: path to the image file - which will be displayed as an project`s icon in projects list.

__group.description: groups projects in the projects list

portraitWidth.description: landscape width of project in portrait mode

portraitHeight.description: landscape height of project in portrait mode

renderResolution.description: increases quality of render on desktop in cost of performance.

renderResolutionMobile.description: increases quality of render on mobile devices in cost of performance.

framesSkipLimit.description: on low performance devices allows to update game logic more that once per each frame.

dynamicStageSize.description: enables stage resizing regarding of allowed screen space. false - keeps projects screen proportions always fixed.

preventUpscale.description: makes project screen size be equal to all allowed screen area, but not less that defined in 'width' and 'height'

webfontloader.description: allows to preload fonts form google.fonts or from project`s assets folder

google.description: list of fonts should be loaded from https://fonts.google.com/

custom.description: list of fonts should be loaded from project assets.

defaultFont.description: font used for render Text objects with no fontFamily property defined

soundFormats.description: List of sounds formats which will be generated for project. Required because there is no format all the browsers support. Usually ogg + aac covers all the browsers you need.

soundDefaultBitrate.description: sounds default bitrate for auto generated ogg and aac files.

fontHolderText.description: invisible peace of text added to the web page for each loaded font, to keep web fonts from unloading. Add a few characters of your language if fonts in game look wrong.

__buildConfigDebug.description: path to vite config used for debug build.

__buildConfigRelease.description: path to vite config used for release build.

loadOnDemandSounds.description: info about way assets loading in to project. Usually this data generated automatically.

mipmap.description: enables mipmap generation for all textures. prevent aliasing effect on small size sprites.

defaultMusVol.description: default global volume level for all BgMusic

defaultSoundsVol.description: default global volume level for all sounds

embedLocales.description: built in all localization data in to projects`s assets.

__localesNewKeysPrefix.description: all new created localization keys will start with this prefix.

__doNotAutoCreateLocalizationFiles.description: disable automatic creation of localization files for all languages.

__suspendWarnings.description: suspends all warnings with listed codes.

defaultLanguage.description: language will be used if no users language present in localization data

autoFullScreenDesktop.description: go to full-screen mode on desktop, after first user click.

autoFullScreenMobile.description: go to full-screen mode on mobile, after first user click.

libs.description: list libraries assets of will be included in to the projects.
